mapper.select: select amt_credit, chk_info, create_time, creator, date_chk, date_opera, del_flag, eu_direct, modifier, modity_time, name_emp_chk, name_emp_opera, note, pk_acccredit, pk_emp_chk, pk_emp_opera, pk_org, pk_pi, pk_piacc from psc_pi_acc_credit where pk_acccredit = #{pkAcccredit}

select amt_credit, chk_info, create_time, creator, date_chk, date_opera, del_flag, eu_direct, modifier, modity_time, name_emp_chk, name_emp_opera, note, pk_acccredit, pk_emp_chk, pk_emp_opera, pk_org, pk_pi, pk_piacc from psc_pi_acc_credit where pk_piacc = #{pkPiacc}

select amt_credit, chk_info, create_time, creator, date_chk, date_opera, del_flag, eu_direct, modifier, modity_time, name_emp_chk, name_emp_opera, note, pk_acccredit, pk_emp_chk, pk_emp_opera, pk_org, pk_pi, pk_piacc from psc_pi_acc_credit
mapper.insert:
insert into psc_pi_acc_credit ( amt_credit, chk_info, create_time, creator, date_chk, date_opera, del_flag, eu_direct, modifier, modity_time, name_emp_chk, name_emp_opera, note, pk_emp_chk, pk_emp_opera, pk_org, pk_pi, pk_piacc ) values ( #{amtCredit}, #{chkInfo}, #{createTime}, #{creator}, #{dateChk}, #{dateOpera}, #{delFlag}, #{euDirect}, #{modifier}, #{modityTime}, #{nameEmpChk}, #{nameEmpOpera}, #{note},
#{pkEmpChk}, #{pkEmpOpera}, #{pkOrg}, #{pkPi}, #{pkPiacc} )
